commands.name: leave
commands.usage: Execute y!leave while in a voice channel

commands.name: play
commands.summary: Plays a song in the current audio channel or adds it to the queue

commands.name: roll
commands.summary: Roll the dice! What did you get?

commands.name: flip
commands.summary: Flip a coin! What side did it land on?

commands.name: pick
commands.summary: Can't decide between some things? Lemme pick for you!

commands.name: kiss
commands.summary: Give that super cool person you know a kiss!

commands.name: slap
commands.summary: Give that person that's been bothering you a *slap!*

commands.name: lewd
commands.summary: D-Did someone say something per-perverted..? L-Lewd....

commands.name: role
commands.summary: Assign (or remove!) a role to/from yourself

commands.name: clear
commands.summary: Clears the last X amount of messages in the current channel

commands.name: clear_with
commands.summary: Clears the last 100 messages that contain the specified phrase in the current channel

commands.name: clear_user
commands.summary: Clears the last 100 messages from the specified user in the current channel

commands.name: slowmode
commands.summary: Slows time (in seconds). y!slowmode to disable

commands.name: ban
commands.summary: Bans the specified user from the server

commands.name: kick
commands.summary: Kicks the specified user from the server

commands.name: mute
commands.summary: Mutes the specified user. Must set up a mute role first.

commands.name: toggle
commands.summary:
Enable/disable settings.

**settings**:
 - **welcome** (for welcome messages)
- **goodbye** (for goodbye messages)
- **slowmodeAdmins**: whether or not admins are affected by slowmode
- **logging**: enable/disable event logging for this server (must run y!set logchannel)

commands.name: delete_nocache
commands.summary: Deletes a channel from the nocache table so messages in that channel can be cached again

commands.name: delete_prefix
commands.summary: Deletes the custom prefix for this server

commands.name: set_welcome
commands.summary:
Sets/edits the welcome message.
Add %user% to the message to add in the new user's username
Add %muser% to the message to @mention the new user.

*Note: Must have welcome messages enabled and a channel set*

commands.name: set_goodbye
commands.summary:
Sets/edits the goodbye message.
Add %user% to the message to add in the new user's username
Add %muser% to the message to @mention the new user.

*Note: Must have goodbye messages enabled and a channel set*

commands.name: set_command
commands.summary: Sets/edits a command and the response text
commands.usage:
y!set command <command-name> <Command Text>
To mention the command executor, add %muser% to the text!
To insert the executor's username into the message, use %user%

commands.name: set_nocache
commands.summary: Sets a channel to be ignored by Yuki's message caching feature

commands.name: set_welcomechannel
commands.summary: Set the channel where welcome/goodbye messages are sent

commands.name: set_rolecolor
commands.summary: Sets the color of a role

commands.name: set_warningaction
commands.summary:
Set a warning action
Available actions: ban, kick, applyrole

commands.name: set_prefix
commands.summary: Sets a custom prefix for this server

commands.name: ignoreserver
commands.summary: Toggles if all channels in the server should be ignored

commands.name: unwarn
commands.summary: Removes a warning from a user

commands.name: warnings
commands.summary: List the warned users and their warnings in this guild

commands.name: set_game
commands.summary: Sets the bots game. BOT OWNER ONLY

commands.name: set_pfp
commands.summary: Sets the bots pfp. BOT OWNER ONLY

commands.name: cachesize
commands.summary: Returns the total number of messages cached. BOT OWNER ONLY

commands.name: backupdb
commands.summary: Performs a manual database backup. BOT OWNER ONLY

commands.name: savecache
commands.summary: Performs a manual message cache backup. BOT OWNER ONLY

commands.name: vote
commands.summary: Casts a vote in a poll

commands.name: commands
commands.summary: Lists the commands set in a server

commands.name: roles
commands.summary: Lists the assignable roles in a server

commands.name: createpoll
commands.usage:
y!createpoll <poll name> | <options> | <end time>

**options:** each option is separated with a ,**
**end time:** when this poll ends.
examples: 2d 4h 3m
4h 3m
3d

Days are represented by a "d", hours by an "h", and minutes my an "m". **maximum length of 14 days, total**

commands.name: stats
commands.summary: Lists the stats of a poll

commands.name: roulette
commands.usage:
y!roulette
y!roulette join
y!roulette leave
y!roulette players
y!roulette start

commands.name: nsfw
commands.summary: Pulls an NSFW image (based on search or randomness)
